title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 not working on all fields in the help search
OB: When using the help search feature, pressing Ctrl+F1 does not work on all fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application help menu.
2. Use the help search to search for a specific topic.
3. Once the search results are displayed, try pressing Ctrl+F1 on different fields.
4. Notice that Ctrl+F1 only works on certain fields, but not on all of them.
